General.Name: KBC Global Limited
General.Description: KBC Global Limited operates as a real estate development company in India. The company develops and sells residential and commercial projects. It also undertakes construction contracts. The company was formerly known as Karda Constructions Limited. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Nashik, India.
General.Address: Sai Krupa Commercial Complex, Nashik, India, 422101
